gobblin.hive

Class HiveRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.hive.HiveRegister
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveMetaStoreBasedRegister

    @Alpha
public abstract class HiveRegister
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A class for registering Hive tables and partitions.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Void> register(HiveSpec spec)
        Register a table or partition given a HiveSpec. This method is asynchronous and returns immediately. This methods evaluates the Predicates and executes the Activitys specified in the HiveSpec. The actual registration happens in registerPath(HiveSpec), which subclasses should implement.
        Returns:
        a ListenableFuture for the process of registering the given HiveSpec.

      • registerPath

        protected abstract void registerPath(HiveSpec spec)
                              throws IOException
        Register the path specified in the given HiveSpec.

        This method should not evaluate Predicates or execute Activitys associated with the HiveSpec, since these are done in register(HiveSpec).

        Throws:
        IOException

      • createDbIfNotExists

        public abstract boolean createDbIfNotExists(String dbName)
                                     throws IOException
        Create a Hive database if not exists.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the name of the database to be created.
        Returns:
        true if the db is successfully created; false if the db already exists.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public abstract boolean createTableIfNotExists(HiveTable table)
                                        throws IOException
        Create a Hive table if not exists.
        Parameters:
        table - a HiveTable to be created.
        Returns:
        true if the table is successfully created; false if the table already exists.

      • addPartitionIfNotExists

        public abstract boolean addPartitionIfNotExists(HiveTable table,
                                                HivePartition partition)
                                         throws IOException
        Add a Hive partition to a table if not exists.
        Parameters:
        table - the HiveTable to which the partition should be added.
        partition - a HivePartition to be added.
        Returns:
        true if the partition is successfully added; false if the partition already exists.
        Throws:
        IOException

                                    String tableName)
                             throws IOException
        Determines whether a Hive table exists.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the database name
        tableName - the table name
        Returns:
        true if the table exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • existsPartition

        public abstract boolean existsPartition(String dbName,
                                        String tableName,
                                        List<HiveRegistrationUnit.Column> partitionKeys,
                                        List<String> partitionValues)
                                 throws IOException
        Determines whether a Hive partition exists.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the database name
        tableName - the table name
        partitionKeys - a list of Columns representing the key of the partition
        partitionValues - a list of Strings representing the value of the partition
        Returns:
        true if the partition exists, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException

                                                             throws IOException
        Get a HiveTable using the given db name and table name.
        Parameters:

        tableName - the table name
        Returns:

      • getPartition

                                                                            String tableName,
                                                                            List<HiveRegistrationUnit.Column> partitionKeys,
                                                                            List<String> partitionValues)
                                                                     throws IOException
        Get a HivePartition using the given db name, table name, partition keys and partition values.
        Parameters:
        dbName - the database name
        tableName - the table name
        partitionKeys - a list of Columns representing the key of the partition
        partitionValues - a list of Strings representing the value of the partition
        Returns:
        an Optional of HivePartition if the partition exists, otherwise Optional.absent().
        Throws:
        IOException

      • alterTable

        public abstract void alterTable(HiveTable table)
                         throws IOException
        Alter the given HiveTable. An Exception should be thrown if the table does not exist.
        Parameters:
        table - a HiveTable to which the existing table should be updated.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • alterPartition

        public abstract void alterPartition(HiveTable table,
                                    HivePartition partition)
                             throws IOException
        Alter the given HivePartition. An Exception should be thrown if the partition does not exist.
        Parameters:
        table - the HiveTable to which the partition belongs.
        partition - a HivePartition to which the existing partition should be updated.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Wait till all registration requested submitted via register(HiveSpec) to finish.
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException - if any registration failed or was interrupted.

      • get

        public static HiveRegister get(State props)
        Get an instance of HiveRegister.
        Parameters:
        props - A State object. To get a specific implementation of HiveRegister, specify property HIVE_REGISTER_TYPE as the class name. Otherwise, DEFAULT_HIVE_REGISTER_TYPE will be returned. This State object is also used to instantiate the HiveRegister object.

      • get

        public static HiveRegister get(State props,
                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> metastoreURI)
        Get an instance of HiveRegister.
        Parameters:
        props - A State object. To get a specific implementation of HiveRegister, specify property HIVE_REGISTER_TYPE as the class name. Otherwise, DEFAULT_HIVE_REGISTER_TYPE will be returned. This State object is also used to instantiate the HiveRegister object.

      • get

        Get an instance of HiveRegister.
        Parameters:
        hiveRegisterType - The name of a class that implements HiveRegister.
